text: Kitabisakalara bahute'i bicarae, yadi sihamte tomalokaka tomalokara imana anara pichata kaphiraraupe ubhata'i niba parailehemtena! Satya spasta horaara pichato sihamtara nijara phalara paraa bidbesabasatah (e'ito karai thake). Eteke tomaloke ksama karaa arau upeksa karaa allahe te'omra kono nirdesa nidiya laike--- niscaya allaha sakalo bastura oparata ksamatabana
